text: Xylokastro–Evrostina () is a municipality in the Corinthia regional unit, Peloponnese, Greece. The seat of the municipality is the town Xylokastro.Kallikratis law Greece Ministry of Interior The municipality has an area of 411.667 km2. ==Municipality== The municipality Xylokastro–Evrostina was formed at the 2011 local government reform by the merger of the following 2 former municipalities, that became municipal units: *Evrostina *Xylokastro ==References== Category:Municipalities of Peloponnese (region) Category:Populated places in Corinthia
title: Xylokastro-Evrostina
